Detailed Description

Osimo v2 Database Class. Used for querying a MySQL database.

Author:
Ryan LeFevre
See also:
OsimoDBQuery

Definition at line 23 of file db2.module.php.

connect (  ) 

Connects to the database specified in the options. If autoconnect is enabled (which is is by default), this function will be called upon class instantiation.

Definition at line 58 of file db2.module.php.

static escape ( $  data,
$  quotes = false 
) [static]

General escape function If given an array, will escape every value in the array The quotes option will put quotes around each item, useful for the WHERE clause of a SQL query. Note: this function is static.

Parameters:
mixed $data
boolean $quotes (optional)
Returns:
Escaped version of $data

Definition at line 80 of file db2.module.php.

static formatDateForDB ( $  date = false  )  [static]

General date formatting function. Will format any date for the DATETIME database fieldtype. Can take both timestamps and pre-formatted dates. If $date is false, then it assumes the current time. Note: this function is static.

Parameters:
mixed $date (optional)
Returns:
The date formatted for MySQL DATETIME format.

Definition at line 113 of file db2.module.php.

get_error (  ) 

Echos any errors reported by MySQL from the last executed query.

Definition at line 162 of file db2.module.php.

query ( $  query  ) 

Begins a generic MySQL query chain. This function is primarily used when the developer wishes to write the whole SQL query as a string instead of building the query using the chaining functions.

Parameters:
String $query
Returns:
new OsimoDBQuery object
